price: 55. Ese día, los habitantes del Paraíso estarán ocupados en cosas placenteras.
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: inna aṣḥāba al-janati al-yawma fī shughulin fākihūna
